alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montgomery County through 430 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prices Fork, or near Blacksburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blacksburg... Christiansburg... Radford... Pilot... Prices Fork... Merrimac... and Walton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
